description: Detect PetitPotam coerced authentication activity. Author: Mauricio Velazco, Michael Haag. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Possible PetitPotam Coerce Authentication Attempt
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_id:"5145" AND winlog.event_data.ShareName:\\\* AND winlog.event_data.ShareName:*\\IPC$ AND winlog.event_data.RelativeTargetName:"lsarpc" AND winlog.event_data.SubjectUserName:"ANONYMOUS\ LOGON")
